text: Sandino is a 1990 Spanish Nicaraguan biographical movie directed by Miguel Littín and starring Kris Kristofferson, Joaquim de Almeida, Dean Stockwell, Ángela Molina, Victoria Abril, Omero Antonutti, Blanca Guerra. ==Other websites== * Category:1990 movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:Spanish biographical movies Category:Nicaraguan movies Category:Chilean movies Category:Italian biographical movies Category:Cuban movies Category:Mexican biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Miguel Littín
title: Sandino (movie)
